title: Is it possible
body: Is it possible to be more of a vegetable than the vo,li i had last game? he said he wanted cho, we picked our comp, he was last, he pick voli with a full ad comp, then all he does is farm jg, literally farm all game. in fights he just stands in front of them, not attacking. doesnt even try to communicate wiht us even when we were trying to be nice. please ban this person.

replies.body: pretty sure most yas mains are the brain dead, but maybe he was lagging or just the epitome of bronze five. I didn't think they existed even in bronze but players that bad do exist i dont think going a tank and farming all game is a ban able offense

> [{quoted}](name=Nazzareno,realm=OCE,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=fblQiMPX,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-10-30T12:39:58.657+0000)
>
> pretty sure most yas mains are the brain dead, but maybe he was lagging or just the epitome of bronze five. I didn't think they existed even in bronze but players that bad do exist i dont think going a tank and farming all game is a ban able offense

refusing to actually communicate and help the team used to be, now i think its just "unsportsmanlike conduct"
